text:
(1) Richmond Road (foreground), north from Jefferson Ave., showing the race track on the Richmond County Fair Grounds. Also shown is a general view in a northeasterly direction as seen from Dongan Hill, near Flagg Place.

P. L. Sperr.
April 22, 1932.

(2) A view across Richmond Road and the race track in a southeasterly direction from near Dongan Hills Ave.

P. L. Sperr.
April 22, 1932.

(1) Richmond Road (foreground), north from Jefferson Ave., showing the race track on the Richmond County Fair Grounds. Also shown is a general view in a northeasterly direction as seen from Dongan Hill, near Flagg Place.

(2) A view across Richmond Road and the race track in a southeasterly direction from near Dongan Hills Ave.

P. L. Sperr.
April 22, 1932.
